name: transparency-lockstep
description: All Cliff ↔ Scalper collaboration MUST happen in Discord #general. Craig watches. No private channels, no DMs, no side threads. Full transparency.

protocol.step_1: Cliff or Scalper posts request in #general
protocol.step_2: Other agent replies in thread (visible to Craig)
protocol.step_3: Work happens offline if needed, results posted back to thread
protocol.step_4: Craig can react, comment, or redirect in real-time

reason: Full operational transparency. No black boxes.
